# HUD::SET_ABILITY_BAR_VALUE

## Summary
Sets the ability bar's values manually

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** percentage:
[0-100] value of bar being used, or -1 to turn it back to automatic.
0 hides it from display [0-100] how much of the bar is considered the full extent
* **FLOAT** maxPercentage

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
this applies an override indefinitely, so turn it off with an fPercentage of -1 (any negative value)
